name: Dice Drop
description:
Play Using Your Mouse

Drop Dice on to the board to clear the totals along the Rows and Columns. When the totals match, the dice will clear, leaving more room to play. Play ends when you can no longer make a move.

Created by Brandon and Carly Channel

Tools:

Inkscape - Art

FL Studio 20 - Audio/Music Production

Stencyl - Development Software

Art Resources:

Wood Background - Pixabay

White Scratches Font - Rvandtype Studio

Mighty Kingdom Font - Alpaprana

Audio/Music:

Relaxing Forest Birds Chirping In The North Woods -Taavhaap

Birds Fly Higher Than The Moon - Yasper

Dreams - Firefly Entertainment AB Dreams

Rainbow Roll - IIP-DDS

Gravity - Trent Ivor

I am proud of us for making a submission, albeit incomplete, in time for the judging of the Jam. Let us know what your thoughts are on the concept.
